doc.title: Video Blog: Ieat learns to cook Fish and Chips
doc.text: Did/DT you/PRP know/VB that/WDT this/DT year/NN marks/IN the/DT 150th/NN anniversary/NN of/IN the/DT invention/NN of/IN that/WDT iconic/JJ British/NN dish/NN ,/, Fish/NN and/CC Chips/NN ?/. The/DT chips/NNS were/VBD excellent/JJ and/CC has/VB that/IN real/JJ potato/NN taste/NN ,/, unlike/NN most/NN of/IN the/DT frozen/JJ chips/NNS that/WDT are/VBP being/VBG served/VBD in/IN restaurants/NN nowadays/RB ./. But/CC the/DT real/JJ surprise/NN is/VBZ Tim/RB 's/POS Beer/NNP Batter/NNP which/WDT is/VBZ the/DT crunchiest/NN ,/, most/NN satisfying/JJ fish/NN I/PRP have/VBP eaten/VBN for/IN a/DT long/JJ while/NN !/.
